content.text: {"risk_score": 0.87, "summary": "High-risk transaction requiring immediate review. $15,000 payment from unknown location without device ID verification. Customer has high-risk profile with prior alerts and no scam education.", "chain_of_thought": "This transaction shows multiple high-risk indicators: 1) Large amount ($15,000) 2) Unknown location 3) Missing device ID for verification 4) Customer has high-risk profile 5) Customer has 2 prior alerts 6) Customer hasn't completed scam education 7) Medium-risk merchant. The combination of large amount, unknown location, and lack of device verification is particularly concerning."}
